1.0.1.name: wordpress/wp-special-textboxes
1.0.1.description:
Adds little style sheet file and short code to blog for highlighting some portion of text in post as colored boxes. That may be warning, alert, info and download portion of post's text.

WARNING!!! Special Text Widget works only under Wordpress 2.8+ !

Available languages:

  • English
  • Russian
  • Italian by Gianni Diurno
  • Belarus by Fat Cower
  • Uzbek by Alisher Safarov
  • Polish by Daniel Fruzynski
  • Arabic by مدونة رسين
  • Dutch by Rene
  • Ukrainian by official ukrainian localization team
  • German by Renate
  • Czech by
